statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 5 \\ -10 \\ -5 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 27 \\ -10 \\ 21 \\ 11 \\ 26 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 2 \\ 15 \\ 5 \\ 20 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
